item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF Getting Started
item.description: In my previous series “Learning Rust”. I decided to attempt to learning some fairly basic rust concepts and constructs by working on a fairly simple project. This seemed to go fairly well. So I am now going to attempt to work on the same project, but this time, using Swift.
